summary: FORD ADVISED THAT THEY WERE READY TO FIX MY AIRBAGS.  I  CALLED 3 DEALERSHIPS IN MY AREA AND WAS TOLD THEY HAD THE PARTS FOR 2010-2017 TO REPAIR/  I CALLED FORD WHO CONNECTED ME TO ANOTHER DEALER OUTSIDE MY AREA.  I FINALLY TOLD THE LOCAL DEALER WHO SID IT WILL TAKE 3-4 WEEKS TO GET THE PARTS.  THEN RECD EMAIL FROM FORD TO TAKE VEHICLE ASAP  DEALER DOES NOT HAVE PARTS AVAILABLE AS OF 3-29-2018
